original_title: Gingerdead: The Adventures of Nella & Nello
overview: In this quirky re-telling of the Grimm Brothers classic, Hansel and Gretel, two white trash children escape the clutches of their abusive stepfather and into the hands of a devious witch and her demonic bakery in post-Katrina New Orleans. Pilot episode for the Bruno Zipes "Storytime" series!
title: Gingerdead: The Adventures of Nella & Nello
